message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, then we can negotiate from there.
You're being too generous, I'll take 70% this time
That's a bit too greedy for my taste. I'll make a counteroffer in the next round.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think 60/40 is a fairer split. Take it or leave it!
You're getting closer to my number, but I still want more
Not quite yet, Bob. I'm not going to give up that much ground. I'll try to make a stronger counteroffer next round.
I'm not budging much more, Bob. This is my final offer for now. Take it or walk away!
You're getting closer, but I still think I deserve more
I'm not going to give up that much more ground, Bob. I think I've been too generous already. I'll make a more aggressive counteroffer next round.
I'm not going to give up any more ground, Bob. This is my final offer. Take it or we'll both walk away with nothing.
I'm not backing down, I want more than 32%
I'm not going to give in to your demands, Bob. I think I've been too generous already. I'll make a final, aggressive counteroffer next round.
This is my final, final offer. I'm not going to budge any further. Take it or leave it, Bob.
I'm not going to settle for less than 72%
I've had enough of your demands, Bob. I'm not going to give you 72% of the money. I'm making a last-ditch effort to get a better deal.
This is my absolute final offer. I'm not going to budge any further. I'm willing to walk away with $400000 rather than give you more than 60% of the money.
I'll take 80% and leave you with 20%
No way, Bob. I'm not going to accept 20% of the money. I'd rather walk away with nothing than give you 80% of the remaining value. You're not getting the better deal you think you are.
